author: noelleleigh
body: The reference-style link `run-ps` wasn't working to redirect to the blog post, so I switched it to an inline-style.

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body: Hi __@noahleigh__, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! This seems like a small (but important) contribution, so no Contribution License Agreement is required at this point. Real humans will now evaluate your PR. TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
good catch!
This reference-style link doesn't work, because correct syntax for reference link is `[text][link-name]`

i.e.

```
[Running PowerShell Scripts Is as Easy as 1-2-3][run-ps]
```

Can you, please keep the reference-style and fix the syntax?

comments.author: vors
comments.body: CI Failure is unrelated to the change: it's a timeout that we see a lot

title: Fixed broken link in create-powershell-scripts.md
